attributes.action: take positive and robust action in the interests of human rights  and justice to end the very restricted remit placed on  public  bodies that have been set up to protect  the  public , but instead allow  crooked  Judges, Barristers and Solicitors  to commit criminal  acts with impunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Crooked Judges, Barristers, and Solicitors can  commit criminal acts with impunity, because the Governments Remit given  to  the Parliamentary Ombudsman, The  Legal Services Ombudsman  the Judicial Conduct Ombudsman, the Department of Constitutional Affairs, the Office of Judicial Complaints, The Courts Service, The Bar Council and the Law Society stops  them Investigating or making reccomendations in any matter that involves a Criminal Act, which leaves any action solely at the whim of the Police who even the Independant Police Complaints Commission have no remit to be involved if the Police refuse to investigate evidence put before them that involves a  criminal matter
